column4: Hello?:-( I've been sitting here for 10 minutes......... When ever I try to enable windows effects, I get a message that says: "The composite extension is not available"
I had same problem. I had to add line to xorg.conf under Section "Extensions" that says Option     "Composite" "Enable"
after you add "Composite" "Enable" to xorg.conf you need to reboot
How do i add "Composite" "Enable" to xorg.conf
How do i add "Composite" "Enable" to xorg.conf
section may be already in xorg.conf and you just need to change "Disable" to "Enable"
you have nothing in your xorg.conf file???
